name: Compare Infobase Ltd
tag_list: website, moblie-technology, website-development, website-management, website-design, mapping, gis, india, maps-of-india, maps-of-world, greetings
overview:
ABOUT US

Compare Infobase Ltd (CIL) grows online and offline Internet initiated global businesses in diverse verticals.

CIL, established in the year 1998 as a Zero Debt company by Mr. Simarprit Singh, is an ISO 9001:2008Certified Company. CIL was established and developed with a vision to incubate and ideate end-to-end solutions for websites and e-businesses. The company started with 50 employees in Delhi. Slowly and steadily, the company grew and today it has over 170 professionals, spread across our two regional offices in India and one international office in US. These professionals working as a team in Compare family are qualified & experienced web developers, content developers, cartographers, designers, surveyors, data collectors and managers.

Our core expertise lies in Content Development, Software development, Maps and Geospatial Services, Custom Application Development, Offshore Product Development, Web Services, management of captive units and our role as an independent vendor.

We have an established business presence in verticals as diverse as Maps, Travel, Handicrafts, Greetings, Celebrations & Festivals, Real Estate, Education and Media. In addition, we carry the potential of diversifying into any online business vertical, which makes us a multifaceted company with numerous divisions following distinct traits. We own and manage more than 500 websites and portals. Also, we have over 2000 domain names in our domain bank.

We have been a member of NASSCOM, the apex body of Indian Software and Service companies, for the last six years. We are also associated with Confederation of Indian Industries (CII), India’s premier business association that has a direct membership of over 6300 organisations from the private as well as public sectors.

milestones.description: Compare Infobase Private Limited gets incorporated.
Starts Operations with 150 seater office at Janakpuri Delhi. Launches portals like Indiaprofile.com, MapsofIndia.com, Dgreetings.com, Indianvisit.com, 123world.com and many more.
Indian Holiday Pvt Ltd purchased Compareâ€™s first online travel website, www.indianvisit.com. A revolutionary project of its period.

Mapsofworld.com gets launched on a global scale. A sister business concern Turnkey Software Projects Private Limited was set up to cater to technological requirements of travel industry. Marketing and sales office started operations in Chembur, Mumbai.
Indianholiday.com was launched. Compare Infobase Private Limited emerges as key technology provider to online travel industry in India.
MapsofIndia.com gains huge popularity in India and abroad. MapsofIndia CD sale distribution channel starts across India.
Compare gets into regular revenue generation business models.  Further launches portal like Economywatch.com, BestIndianSites.com, MyDearValentine.com and many more.
International offices opened in San Jose, California and Bangkok, Thailand. Mapsofworld.com gains popularity and bags international projects. MapXL Inc incorporated in US during August.

Business grew for both Compare Infobase Private Limited and Turnkey Software Private Limited and at this stage international client acquisition was initiated. Calcutta Knowledge Center was established. Gurgaon Technology Center began with a team strength
During March Turnkey Software Projects Limited and Compare Infobase Limited merged to Compare Infobase Limited. Sales and Marketing offices opened in Bangalore and Hyderabad.
Compare Infobase Limited became ISO 9001:2000 certified company. Processes were set up in place to ISO norms for over 1000 employees across five offices.

Silicon Valley investments start coming in for projects like Indiaedu.com, Dgreetings.com, Naukrihub.com etc.  Mapsofworld.com became the 1st Indian website to get listed within the Top 1000 Most Popular Websites in US (as measured through www.quantcast.c
